title: Unit, Zero, Equal Matrices and Transposition Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of special matrices and matrix transposition.

questions.question: What is the transpose of matrix [1 2; 3 4]?
questions.explanation: Transposition swaps rows and columns: element (i,j) becomes element (j,i).

questions.question: Which property states that (Aᵀ)ᵀ = A?
questions.explanation: Double transposition returns the original matrix.

questions.question: When are two matrices A and B equal?
options: When they have the same number of elements
When they have the same dimensions and identical elements
When one is the transpose of the other
questions.explanation: Matrices are equal if they have identical dimensions and corresponding elements are equal.

questions.question: What is special about the identity matrix I?
options: It has 1s on the main diagonal and 0s elsewhere
questions.explanation: The identity matrix has 1s on the main diagonal and 0s in all other positions.

questions.question: If A is a 2×3 matrix, what are the dimensions of Aᵀ?
questions.explanation: Transposition swaps dimensions: m×n becomes n×m.
